colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @069A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI GNAM BSKOS 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA BDAG PO CHEN PO'I BKAS MNGAGS DAD LDAN ZHI DAR DU 'GRO BA AAM BAN CHEN PO PE SE BDE LEGS RDO RJE NAS 'BRAL MED RJES SU BZUNG PA'I DRIL BU LUGS KYI BDE MCHOG LHA LNGA'I SMON TSIG @069B 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES LUNG GIS BSKUL MA MDZAD PAR BRTEN, ^RJE BTZUN DAM PA HO THOG THU SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN RANG NYID KYANG BAG CHAGS 'JOG PA DANG, RJES 'JUG SKAL BZANG GDUL BYA RNAMS RJES SU BRTZE BAS BZUNG PHYIR DVANG PA  CHEN POS SBYAR BA'O, ,DPAL HE RU KA'I BDAG NYID CHEN PO SNANG MTHA'I MGON PO SKYABS MGON PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LA SOGS PA BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU DAM PA MTHA' DAG ZHABS PAD BRTAN CING, RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR ZHVA SER RING LUGS DRI MA MED PA'I MDO @070A *, ,SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU'ANG BDAG CAG SKYE RGU MTHA' DAG DPAL HE RU KA'I LAM LA THOS BSAM BSGOM GSUM LA 'BAD PA'I MTHUS, SKAL LDAN YONGS LA 'BRAS BU DUS SU SMIN CING JI LTA JI SNYED MNGON SUM DU MKHYEN PA'I YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG TSE 'DIR DNGOS SU THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
